item.title: Making NPCs Talk
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

This isnt your normal kind of making NPCs talk topic. I’ve been trying to make it so when I click on an NPC, it says a phrase (like it would if it auto-talked in NPCHandler.Java).

But I always get errors. Does anybody know how to make them talk in client.java?

Ive made a void in npchandler.java:

	public void makeWiseTalk()
		{
		for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCs; i++) {
			if (npcs[i] == null) continue;
			npcs[i].clearUpdateFlags();
		}
		if (npcs[i].npcType == 2566) {
		npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
		npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
		npcs[i].textUpdate = "Talking Text Goes Here :)";
			}
		}

Then in client.java under the first click on npc case, i made something like this

if (npcid == 0000) {
server.npcHandler.makeWiseTalk();
}

But I always end up with an error of some sort usually like “cannot find variable i” or something.

So does anybody know how to fix my code, or how to just make NPCs talk in client.java when an event happens?

Thanks in advance!

Read full topic
